install.name: R3D Floater
install.author: Richard Dvorak
install.description: PLEASE GO TO R3D FLOATER MODULE FOR DESCRIPTION

param.name: module_name
param.label: Module Name
param.description: Name of the Module to be shown inside the floater. Example: newsflash (to import mod_newsflash on position floater)

param.name: module_title
param.label: Module Title
param.description: Title of the Module to be shown inside the floater. Example: Floater Newsflash (to import a mod_newsflash named Floater Newsflash on position floater)

param.name: timeout
param.label: Timeout
param.description: Time until Box disappears - select: 5 sec through 86400 sec(one whole day!)

param.name: startpos
param.label: Initial Position of box
param.description: Initial Position of box (don't write px after the integer.)

param.name: rightpos
param.label: Position right
param.description: Ending Position of module when sliding right (don't write px after the integer.)

param.name: rightspeed
param.label: Speed right
param.description: Sliding Speed of module when sliding right, the smaller the number, the faster...

param.name: leftpos
param.label: Position left
param.description: Ending Position of module when sliding left (don't write px after the integer.)

param.name: leftspeed
param.label: Speed left
param.description: Sliding Speed of module when sliding left, the smaller the number, the faster...

param.name: boxwidth
param.label: Container box width
param.description: Width of box that will contain the floater module in px.

param.name: boxheight
param.label: Container box height
param.description: Height of box that will contain the floater module in px.

param.name: boxleft
param.label: Container box left
param.description: Distance of box left.

param.name: boxtop
param.label: Container box top
param.description: Distance of box from top.

param.name: bgcolor
param.label: bgcolor
param.description: Background color of container box - use 'transparent' or color hex like '#ffffff'.

param.name: border
param.label: border
param.description: Border of container box - Example: 7px solid #135CAE or none for no border

param.name: opacity
param.label: Box Opacity
param.description: Opacity of container box - full numbers between 0(=not visible) and 100(=fully visible)

param.name: talign
param.label: Box align
param.description: Text-align of container box - left, center, right

param.name: iwidth
param.label: Inside box width
param.description: Width of Div Inside the Box that will contain the floater module px.

param.name: iheight
param.label: Inside box height
param.description: Height of Div Inside the Box that will contain the floater module in px.

param.name: ileft
param.label: Container box left
param.description: Padding left.

param.name: itop
param.label: Container box top
param.description: Padding top. Not counting .Close Window.

param.name: ibgcolor
param.label: bgcolor
param.description: Background color of container box - use 'transparent' or color hex like '#f7f7f7'.

param.name: iborder
param.label: border
param.description: Border of container box - Example: 1px dotted grey or none for no border

param.name: italign
param.label: Text align Inside
param.description: Text-align of Div Inside the Box - left, center, right

param.name: ioverflow
param.label: Overflow
param.description: What happens to content larger then the Inside Div? Choose an Option
